name: Mirror Layers - Escape Room DEMO
description:
In Mirror Layers the player acts as themselves. 

You received an anonymous invitation that asks you to reach
Chandran Apartments, a bizarre 16 stories tall apartment
complex where weird "Escape room" games are held.

Will you join the game?

This prologue will give you only a glimpse of what you'll find in Mirror Layers. For, did you know? There's a peculiar mirror in Chandran Apartments...

To know more about it, visit Mirror Layers Steam page or Mirror Layers official website. 
Join our Discord server & Don't forget to wishlist!
